title: Hunt or Be Hunted: Burning Desires
description: A highly trained sniper is on the loose in Greenland, Minnesota. Can he be tracked down and stopped before he kills again? Detective Harry Jones and his partner Jimmy Morestead are hot on the killer's trail. This is the ultimate game of cat and mouse. In order to stop him they must look around every corner, under every rock, and make sure they turn over every leaf. Because everyone is a suspect, in this mind boggling twister. Will they find him before his scope finds them?
author: C.H. Bordelon
